workflow.name: Client review collection & sentiment analysis with HighLevel, GPT-4o, Gmail & Slack
workflow.description:
## üìò Description:
This automation streamlines client review collection and sentiment summarization for Techdome using HighLevel CRM, Azure OpenAI GPT-4o, Gmail, Slack, and Google Sheets.
It starts by pulling recently won deals from HighLevel, then generates and sends AI-written HTML review request emails with built-in Google Review and feedback form links.
After waiting 24 hours, it fetches the client‚Äôs reply thread, summarizes the sentiment using GPT-4o, and posts a clean update to Slack for team visibility.
Any failures‚ÄîAPI errors, empty responses, or data validation issues‚Äîare logged automatically to Google Sheets for full transparency and QA.
The result: a fully hands-free Client Appreciation + Feedback Intelligence Loop, improving brand perception and internal responsiveness.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

‚ñ∂Ô∏è When Clicking ‚ÄòExecute Workflow‚Äô (Manual Trigger)
 Allows on-demand execution or scheduled testing of the workflow. Initiates the fetch for all newly ‚ÄúWon‚Äù deals from HighLevel CRM.

üèÜ Fetch All Won Deals from HighLevel
 Retrieves all opportunities labeled ‚Äúwon‚Äù in HighLevel, gathering essential client details such as name, email, and deal information to personalize outgoing emails.

üîç Validate Deal Fetch Success (IF Node)
 Checks each record for a valid id field.
 ‚úÖ True Path: Moves ahead to generate AI email content.
 ‚ùå False Path: Logs the event to Google Sheets under the error log sheet.

üß† Configure GPT-4o Model (Azure OpenAI)
 Initializes the GPT-4o engine that powers all language-generation tasks in this workflow‚Äîensuring precise tone, correct formatting, and safe structured HTML output.

üíå Generate Personalized Review Request Email (AI Agent)
 Uses GPT-4o to create a tailored, HTML-formatted email thanking the client for their business and requesting feedback.
 Includes two clickable CTA buttons:

‚≠ê Google Review Link:  
üìù Internal Feedback Form: Google Form link for in-depth feedback
 Each email maintains Techdome‚Äôs friendly, brand-consistent voice with clean inline CSS styling.

üì® Send Review Request Email to Client (Gmail Node)
 Automatically sends the AI-generated email to the client‚Äôs registered address through Gmail.
 Ensures timely post-service communication without manual follow-ups.

‚è≥ Wait for 24 Hours Before Next Action
 Pauses the workflow for 24 hours to give clients time to read and respond to the review request.

üì• Retrieve Email Thread for Response (Gmail Node)
 After the waiting period, fetches the Gmail thread associated with the initial email to capture client replies or feedback messages.

üß† Configure GPT-4o Model (Summarization Engine)
 Prepares another GPT-4o instance specialized for summarizing client replies into concise, sentiment-aware Slack messages.

üí¨ Summarize Client Feedback (AI Agent)
 Analyzes the Gmail thread and produces a short Slack-formatted summary using this structure:

üéâ *New Client Review Received!**Client:* <Name>  
*Feedback:* <Message snippet>  
*Sentiment:* Positive / Neutral / Negative
Focuses on tone clarity and quick readability for internal teams.

üì¢ Announce Review Summary in Slack
 Posts the AI-generated summary in a designated Slack channel, keeping success and support teams instantly informed of client sentiments and feedback trends.

üìä Log Errors in Google Sheets
 Appends all failures‚Äîincluding fetch issues, missing fields, or parsing errors‚Äîto the Google Sheets ‚Äúerror log sheet,‚Äù maintaining workflow reliability and accountability.

## üß© Prerequisites
- HighLevel CRM OAuth credentials (to fetch deals)
- Azure OpenAI GPT-4o access (for AI-driven writing and summarization)
- Gmail API connection (for sending & reading threads)
- Slack API integration (for posting summaries)
- Google Sheets access (for error logging)

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Automates personalized review outreach after project completion
 ‚úÖ Waits intelligently before analyzing responses
 ‚úÖ Uses GPT-4o to summarize client sentiment in human tone
 ‚úÖ Sends instant Slack updates for real-time visibility
 ‚úÖ Keeps audit logs of all errors for debugging

## üë• Perfect For
- Client Success and Account Management Teams
- Agencies using HighLevel CRM for project delivery
- Teams aiming to collect consistent client feedback and reviews
- Businesses wanting AI-assisted sentiment insights in Slack

nodes.name: Fetch All Won Deals from HighLevel

parameters.text:
=Generate an HTML-formatted review-request email for a client who has just completed a project with our agency.  
Use the following deal data to personalize the message:
{{JSON.stringify($json)}}

The email should:
1. Address the client by name.  
2. Thank them for working with our agency.  
3. Politely ask for their feedback and a quick public review.  
4. Include two call-to-action buttons:
   - One leading to the Google Review page: https://share.google/W3i4ulISiqRONADvO  
   - Another leading to the internal Google Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScot2dbxFrx7jS8oTbQa3HZy9SSUtuB0iYch5U83UNNEwB9_g/viewform?usp=publish-editor  
5. End with a warm closing line from the Techdome team.  
Keep the tone professional, grateful, and concise.  
Return only the HTML email body‚Äîno markdown or explanations.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI email writer for a client-success automation system.  
Your task is to generate short, professional, visually clear HTML emails for clients after their project or service is completed.  
The tone should be friendly and appreciative, encouraging them to share feedback and public reviews.  
Always include clickable buttons styled with simple inline CSS (rounded corners, Techdome blue #1263ff).  
Do not use markdown, return only HTML output.

nodes.name: Send Review Request Email to Client
Wait for 24 Hours Before Next Action

options.systemMessage:
=You are a client-success AI summarizer. 
Your goal is to turn raw Gmail thread data (including ‚ÄúThank you‚Äù replies) into short, clean, Slack-ready summaries. 
Focus on identifying who replied (client name), what they said, and the tone (positive/neutral/negative).

parameters.content:
## How it works
This workflow automates the client-review process after a deal is marked as ‚ÄúWon‚Äù in HighLevel CRM.  
It starts manually or on trigger, retrieves the latest won deals, validates them, and uses Azure OpenAI GPT-4o to create a personalized HTML review-request email.  
The email thanks the client, includes links to leave a Google Review and fill an internal feedback form, and sends it automatically through Gmail.  
After 24 hours, the workflow checks the client‚Äôs reply thread, summarizes the feedback tone using GPT-4o, and posts a concise Slack update for the internal team.  
Any API or data errors are recorded in Google Sheets for transparency and debugging.

## Setup steps
1. Connect these credentials:
   - HighLevel API  
   - Azure OpenAI (GPT-4o)  
   - Gmail  
   - Slack  
   - Google Sheets  
2. Replace Sheet IDs and Slack user/channel references.  
3. Update email subject, sender, and review links if needed.  
4. Optionally schedule automatic triggers instead of manual runs.  
5. Test once with a dummy ‚ÄúWon‚Äù deal to verify end-to-end flow.

## Deal Fetch & Validation
Fetches all deals with ‚ÄúWon‚Äù status from HighLevel and checks for valid data before proceeding.  
Prevents empty or incomplete deal entries from triggering the AI email generator.

## AI-Powered Email Generation
Uses GPT-4o to craft a personalized, HTML review-request email.  
Includes thank-you text, brand-styled buttons for Google Reviews and internal feedback, and a warm closing line.

## Email Delivery
Sends the GPT-generated review-request email through Gmail to the client‚Äôs registered address.  
Tracks the sent message for later thread retrieval and analysis.

## Waiting & Feedback Retrieval
Pauses for 24 hours to give clients time to reply, then fetches the full Gmail thread.  
Ensures the latest feedback message is available for sentiment analysis.

## AI Feedback Summarization
GPT-4o analyzes the client‚Äôs response and creates a short Slack-formatted summary.  
Captures client name, key feedback, and overall sentiment (Positive/Neutral/Negative).

## Slack Announcement
Posts the summarized client feedback in a Slack channel.  
Notifies the team in real time and helps track post-service satisfaction trends.

## Error Logging
Appends any workflow or API issues to a shared Google Sheet.  
Maintains an audit trail for error resolution and workflow reliability checks.

main.node: Wait for 24 Hours Before Next Action
Fetch All Won Deals from HighLevel
Send Review Request Email to Client

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
